title: Black bean and chicken quesadillas
ingredients: ['4 chicken breast fillets', '1 onion', '1 to 2 green peppers', '4 cloves of garlic', 'vegetable oil for frying', 'salt and pepper', '1 teaspoon taco seasoning', '1 (400g) tin black beans', '10 flour tortillas', '350g mature Cheddar cheese', 'soured cream or creme fraiche for dipping']
